name: The Resistance
startIntroPart1: You can't build cities, good luck
startIntroPart2: The Resistance never falters. We will establish a new world order!
declaringWar: You will be overthrown in the name of glory!
defeated: We never lose. We will come back from the ashes, whether it takes 100 or 1000 years
introduction: We'll be good friends if you accept our conditions.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
uniques: Militaristic City-States grant units [1.5] times as fast when you are at war with a common nation
